branchCategory.name: AS-X785
branchCategory.description: <p>AS-X785 is a pilot operated check valve that is intended for direct mounting on the device being controlled.  It is available in combinations of threaded and One-touch connections for installation versatility.</p>

branchItem.name: AS-X785, Pilot Check Valve with Metal Body
branchItem.description: <p>AS-X785 is a pilot operated check valve that is intended for direct mounting on the device being controlled.  It is available in combinations of threaded and One-touch connections for installation versatility.</p>
